about_the_game:
A big thank you to Epic History TV for providing the audio for our video trailer.

Epic History TV is a world-renowned leader in historical storytelling. Be sure to check them out on YouTube for more amazing content.

About Kings of Emperor Bonaparte:

Kings of Emperor Bonaparte extends the classic vanilla wargame skirmish by providing a dynamic, persistent 24/7 war that anyone can join at any time. This online PvP experience recreates the intensity of the Napoleonic Wars, offering players the chance to take part in a massive, ongoing conflict that evolves with every skirmish and battle. Set in the historical region of Alessandria in Northern Italy, players will fight for control of key locations, pushing the frontlines and changing the tides of war with every victory and defeat. Future plans include expanding the map to cover the full breadth of the Napoleonic campaigns, from Paris to Moscow.

Players can choose to side with either the French Empire or the Coalition forces, engaging in fierce battles to capture towns and strategic positions. Each faction brings its own unique playstyle and tactical options, from powerful infantry formations to decisive cavalry charges. You'll need to adapt to changing battlefield conditions, plan your assaults, and coordinate with your allies to achieve victory.

The game offers an immersive historical experience, with authentic units, weapons, and tactics inspired by the Napoleonic Wars. Whether leading a cavalry charge or commanding artillery to bombard enemies, you'll be immersed in the chaos and strategy of 19th-century warfare. The persistent nature of the game ensures that every skirmish affects the greater war effort, making each player's contribution meaningful in the grand campaign.

Do you have what it takes to change history? Join the fight in Kings of Emperor Bonaparte and lead your faction to victory!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 SP1, Windows 8, Windows 10 (64-bit versions)
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-2100 or equivalent
  • Memory: 2000 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 3000 or equivalent (with 512MB VRAM)
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1500 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 (64-bit version)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-3470 or equivalent
  • Memory: 4000 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 660 or equivalent (with 1GB VRAM)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1500 MB available space

short_description: A persistent online wargame set in Napoleonic Europe. Command infantry, cavalry, and artillery to achieve victory.
